title: Ep. 726 There Will Be Order Here
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the real reasons liberals are losing their minds over Trump’s comments about a violent gang. I also discuss the panic breaking out among former Obama administration officials as the Spygate timeline comes together. 
 
News Picks:
Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting. 
 
Andy McCarthy’s terrific piece about the constantly changing origin story of Spygate. 
 
Byron York also addresses the Spygate origin story. 
 
Are FBI agents going to blow the whistle? Here’s what may be stopping them. 
 
Denis Prager’s piece explains the real reasons liberals are enraged that Trump called violent gang members “animals.” 
 
Big wins last night for anti-establishment candidates.
 
Support for “gun control” fades. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.

content:encoded:
Summary: In this episode I address the real reasons liberals are losing their minds over Trump’s comments about a violent gang. I also discuss the panic breaking out among former Obama administration officials as the Spygate timeline comes together.    News Picks: Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting.    Andy McCarthy’s terrific piece about the constantly changing origin story of Spygate.    Byron York also addresses the Spygate origin story.    Are FBI agents going to blow the whistle? Here’s what may be stopping them.    Denis Prager’s piece explains the real reasons liberals are enraged that Trump called violent gang members “animals.”    Big wins last night for anti-establishment candidates.   Support for “gun control” fades.    Copyright CRTV.
